Overview_EN: Helping everyone have enough money for food and a home.
Overview_YO: Láti ran gbogbo ènìyàn lọ́wọ́ láti ní owó tó tó fún oúnjẹ àti ilé.
Overview_HA: Taimaka wa kowa ya sami isasshen kudi na abinci da gida.
Overview_IG: Inyere onye ọ bụla aka nwee ego zuru oke maka nri na ebe obibi.

Overview_EN: Making sure no child goes to bed hungry.
Overview_YO: Jíjẹ́ kí á mọ̀ pé kò sí ọmọ kankan tí yóò sùn pẹ̀lú ebi.
Overview_HA: Tabbatar da cewa babu yaron da zai kwanta da yunwa.
Overview_IG: Ime ka ọ ghara nwee nwa ga-arahụ ụra n'agụụ.

Overview_EN: Keeping our bodies strong and visiting doctors when sick.
Overview_YO: Sísọ ara wa di dídá àti bíbẹ àwọn dókítà wò nígbà tí a bá ń ṣàìsàn.
Overview_HA: Kula da lafiyar jikinmu da ziyartar likitoci idan ba mu da lafiya.
Overview_IG: Idebe ahụ anyị ọcha na ịga hụ dọkịta ma ọ bụrụ na anyị ana-arịa ọrịa.

Overview_EN: Helping every child go to school and learn new things.
Overview_YO: Láti ran gbogbo ọmọ lọ́wọ́ láti lọ sí ilé-ìwé àti kọ́ àwọn nǹkan tuntun.
Overview_HA: Taimaka wa kowane yaro ya tafi makaranta ya koyi sabbin abubuwa.
Overview_IG: Inyere nwatakịrị ọ bụla aka ịga akwụkwọ na ịmụ ihe ọhụrụ.

Overview_EN: Boys and girls should have the same chances to lead.
Overview_YO: Àwọn ọmọkùnrin àti ọmọbìnrin yóò ní àǹfààní kan náà láti jẹ́ olórí.
Overview_HA: Yara maza da mata ya kamata su sami dama iri daya na jagoranci.
Overview_IG: Ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị inwe ohere nha anya ịbụ ndị ndu.

Overview_EN: Making sure everyone has clean water to drink and wash.
Overview_YO: Jíjẹ́ kí á mọ̀ pé gbogbo ènìyàn ní omi mímọ́ láti mu àti láti fọṣọ.
Overview_HA: Tabbatar kowa yana da tsaftataccen ruwan sha da na wanka.
Overview_IG: Ime ka onye ọ bụla nwee mmiri dị ọcha ọ ga-aṅụ na nke ọ ga-eji asachapụ ihe.

Overview_EN: Using power from the sun and wind that does not hurt the earth.
Overview_YO: Lílo agbára láti ọ̀dọ̀ oòrùn àti afẹ́fẹ́ tí kò ní pa ayé lára.
Overview_HA: Yin amfani da wutar lantarki daga rana da iska wacce ba ta cutar da duniya.
Overview_IG: Iji ike sitere n'anyanwụ na ikuku nke na-adịghị emerụ ụwa ahụ.

Overview_EN: Helping grown-ups find good jobs to take care of their families.
Overview_YO: Láti ran àwọn àgbàlagbà lọ́wọ́ láti rí iṣẹ́ gidi láti tọ́jú ẹbí wọn.
Overview_HA: Taimaka wa manya su sami ayyuka nagari don kula da iyalansu.
Overview_IG: Inyere ndị okenye aka ịchọta ezigbo ọrụ ha ga-eji na-elekọta ezinụlọ ha.

Overview_EN: Building better roads, bridges, and smart tools for everyone.
Overview_YO: Kíkọ́ àwọn ojú ọ̀nà tó dára, afárá, àti àwọn ohun èlò ọlọ́gbọ́n fún gbogbo ènìyàn.
Overview_HA: Gina hanyoyi masu kyau, gadoji, da kayan aiki masu kyau ga kowa.
Overview_IG: Ịrụ ezigbo ụzọ, àmì, na ngwa ọrụ dị mma maka onye ọ bụla.

Overview_EN: Treating everyone fairly, no matter who they are or where they live.
Overview_YO: Láti tọ́jú gbogbo ènìyàn lọ́gbọọgba, láìka ẹni tí wọ́n jẹ́ tàbí ibi tí wọ́n ń gbé sí.
Overview_HA: Bi da kowa cikin adalci, ko su wanene ko kuma a ina suke zaune.
Overview_IG: Imeso onye ọ bụla n'ụzọ ziri ezi, n'agbanyeghị onye ha bụ ma ọ bụ ebe ha bi.

Overview_EN: Making our towns safe, green, and beautiful for children.
Overview_YO: Sísọ àwọn ìlú wa di dídá, títura, àti dídára fún àwọn ọmọdé.
Overview_HA: Sa garuruwanmu su kasance lafiyayyu da kyau ga yara.
Overview_IG: Ime ka obodo anyị nwee nchebe, ahịhịa ndụ, ma maa mma maka ụmụaka.

Overview_EN: Using things wisely and not wasting food or plastic.
Overview_YO: Lílo àwọn nǹkan pẹ̀lú ọgbọ́n àti láìfòfò oúnjẹ tàbí ike ṣòfò.
Overview_HA: Yin amfani da abubuwa cikin hikima ba tare da ɓata abinci ko roba ba.
Overview_IG: Iji ihe eme ihe n'ụzọ amamihe na ịghara imefu nri ma ọ bụ rọba.

Overview_EN: Taking care of our planet to stop it from getting too hot.
Overview_YO: Títọ́jú ayé wa láti dènà rẹ̀ láti má bàa gbóná jù.
Overview_HA: Kula da duniyarmu don hana ta yin zafi sosai.
Overview_IG: Ilekọta ụwa anyị iji gbochie ya ịdị oke ọkụ.

Overview_EN: Protecting fish and sea animals in our big oceans.
Overview_YO: Dídáàbò bo àwọn ẹja àti àwọn ẹranko inú òkun nínú àwọn òkun ńlá wa.
Overview_HA: Kiyaye kifi da sauran dabbobin ruwa a cikin manyan tekuna.
Overview_IG: Ichebe azụ na anụmanụ ndị dị n'ime oke osimiri anyị.

Overview_EN: Taking care of forests, plants, and all animals on land.
Overview_YO: Títọ́jú àwọn igbó, ohun ọ̀gbìn, àti gbogbo ẹranko lórí ilẹ̀.
Overview_HA: Kula da gandun daji, shuke-shuke, da dukkan dabbobi a doron ƙasa.
Overview_IG: Ilekọta oke ọhịa, osisi, na anụmanụ niile nọ n'ala.

Overview_EN: Living in peace and making sure everyone follows fair rules.
Overview_YO: Gbigbe ní àlàáfíà àti rírí i pé gbogbo ènìyàn ń tẹ̀lé òfin tó tọ́.
Overview_HA: Zama cikin lafiya da tabbatar da kowa yana bin dokoki masu kyau.
Overview_IG: Ibi n'udo na ime ka onye ọ bụla soro iwu ziri ezi.

Overview_EN: Working together with other countries to reach these goals.
Overview_YO: Ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè mìíràn láti ṣàṣeyọrí àwọn góńgó yìí.
Overview_HA: Yin aiki tare da sauran ƙasashe don cimma waɗannan manufofi.
Overview_IG: Isoro mba ndị ọzọ rụọ ọrụ iji nweta ebumnuche ndị a.
